mapper.select: SELECT r.reply_no, r.reply_writer, r.reply_origin, r.reply_content, r.reply_wtime, r.reply_utime, m.member_nickname as memberNickname, m.member_mbti as memberMbti, m.member_location as memberLocation, m.member_school as memberSchool, nvl(mp.attachment_no, 0) as profileUrl from reply r left join member m ON r.reply_writer = m.member_no left join member_profile mp on m.member_no = mp.member_no where r.reply_origin = #{replyOrigin} order by r.reply_wtime desc

select * from ( select r.reply_no, r.reply_writer, r.reply_origin, r.reply_content, r.reply_wtime, r.reply_utime, m.member_nickname as memberNickname, m.member_mbti as memberMbti, m.member_location as memberLocation, m.member_school as memberSchool, nvl(mp.attachment_no, 0) AS profileUrl from reply r left join member m on r.reply_writer = m.member_no left join member_profile mp on m.member_no = mp.member_no where r.reply_writer = #{replyWriter} and r.reply_origin = #{replyOrigin} order by r.reply_wtime desc ) where rownum = 1
mapper.update: update reply set reply_content = #{replyContent}, reply_utime = systimestamp where reply_no = #{replyNo}
